Hello All,

I got this email recently.  Is he at it again?  Gary

Hello:

I am a private collector and I have 2 japanese swords (katana and tanto) with the blade from XVIII century. I would like to sell them for the reasonable price (700US$ and 450US$). If you could have an interest, please write directly to: luytjens1939@...

Pawel
Luytjens1939@...
